definitions.title: Pe.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. ´[[מ]]: Da 5:26 God has numbered (the days of) thy kingdom (acc.; i.e. put an end to it);—[[מְנֵא]] v. infr.

definitions.title: Pa.
definitions.body: appoint, acc. pers.: Pf. 3 ms. [[מַנִּי]] Da 2:24 (+ Inf.), v:Da 2:49 ([[ל]] pers. + [[עַל]] rei); 2 ms. [[מִבִּיתָ]] Da 3:12 ([[עַל]] rei); Imv. ms. [[מֶנִּי]] (K:§, 47, 3, c)) Ezr 7:25.
